org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.facilities

Class Facility

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.BladeBase
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.facilities.Facility
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, Blade
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Plant

    public class Facility
extends BladeBase
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Provides a thread pool for non-blocking and isolation targetReactor. Multiple facilities with independent life cycles are also supported. (A ServiceClosedException may be thrown when messages cross facilities and the target facility is closed.) In addition, the facility maintains a set of AutoClosable objects that are closed when the facility is closed, as well as a table of properties.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Facility

        protected Facility(java.lang.String _name,
        int _initialLocalMessageQueueSize,
        int _initialBufferSize,
        int _threadCount,
        java.util.concurrent.ThreadFactory _threadFactory)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a Facility.
        Parameters:
        _name - The name of the facility.
        _initialLocalMessageQueueSize - How big should the initial inbox doLocal queue size be?
        _initialBufferSize - How big should the initial outbox (per target Reactor) buffer size be?
        _threadCount - The thread pool size.
        _threadFactory - The factory used to create threads for the threadpool.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
